title: Surprise Visit!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>Where did I put it...... I thought I put it here somewhere......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Eli, do you have a minute?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Um, not really...... Maybe here?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Hey, you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>It’s not here either!? Then......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>ELI!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>KYAHH!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>WHA!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>......Why’d you suddenly yell like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You’re just overreacting! I’ve been trying to get your attention for a while.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Oh, really? Sorry, I wasn’t paying attention. What’s up?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>...Umm...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You scared me so much that I forgot......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>......Can you help me find the documents while you try to remember whatever it was?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Huh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>It’ll help you jog your memory. Come on, come on, help me look for the gym rental application form!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
